SnippetCode.val:
imports System imports System.Web imports System.Text imports System.Drawing
Public Class Snippet
Public Shared Function func(ByVal signature As System.String, ByVal signature_smooth As System.String, ByVal filename As System.String) As System.String dim ctlsignature as SuperSignature.MouseSignature dim sig as String = "" dim smsig as String = "" try ctlsignature = New SuperSignature.MouseSignature() catch ex as Exception return "ERR3:"+ex.Message end try
dim mybytes as byte() dim mybytes_smooth as Byte() try mybytes = Convert.FromBase64String(signature) catch ex as Exception return "ERR1:"+ex.Message end try try sig = encoding.utf8.GetString(mybytes) catch ex as Exception return "ERR2:"+ex.Message end try if signature_smooth > "" then mybytes_smooth = Convert.FromBase64String(signature_smooth) smsig = encoding.utf8.getstring(mybytes_smooth) ctlsignature.SignDataSmooth = smsig end if dim bmpSign as bitmap bmpSign = ctlsignature.GenerateSignature(sig, "") try bmpSign.Save (filename) catch ex as Exception return "ERR4:"+ex.Message end try return "" End Function
End Class
